Text: Is there any way to get this in Mp3? Sorry I'm still trying to figure out FLAC. I just love her music.
Thank you very much for this and all others,great job!
some tracks are broken in the beginning - bad rip (Suzanne Vega - [Days Of Open Hand #08] Big Space, Suzanne Vega - [Days Of Open Hand #03] Rusted Pipe)

Hello Dannweg,

three of these albums aren't my rip and one of them is "Days of Open Hand". I did not listen completely through all albums and the accurate rip results in the log-file of that special album seemed reliable. Obviously a fake. I'm sorry for that. All other albums should be o.k.

Thanks for the info :-)

"Solitude Standing": 
04- In The Eye
06 - Solitude Standing
11 - Tom's Diner (Reprise)

Not as obvious as on "Days of Open Hand", but slightly cut (few milliseconds) at the beginning.
Forget the log-file. No accurate rip!

This torrent is nearly one year old and nobody has complained so far, so a correction from my side is pointless.
All i can say is, that i'm probably more annoyed than most of you downloaders.
Sorry again.
